name: GALLIUM Artefacts
description: Detects artefacts associated with activity group GALLIUM - Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center indicators released in December 2019.
query: (winlog.channel:DNS\ Server AND event.code:257 AND QNAME:(/[Aa][Ss][Yy][Ss][Pp][Yy]256\.[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /[Hh][Oo][Tt][Kk][Ii][Ll][Ll][Mm][Aa][Ii][Ll]9[Ss][Dd][Dd][Cc][Cc]\.[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /[Rr][Oo][Ss][Aa][Ff]112\.[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /[Cc][Vv][Dd][Ff][Hh][Jj][Hh]1231\.[Mm][Yy][Ff][Tt][Pp]\.[Bb][Ii][Zz]/ OR /[Ss][Zz]2016[Rr][Oo][Ss][Ee]\.[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /[Dd][Ff][Ff][Ww][Ee][Ss][Cc][Ww][Ee][Rr]4325\.[Mm][Yy][Ff][Tt][Pp]\.[Bb][Ii][Zz]/ OR /[Cc][Vv][Dd][Ff][Hh][Jj][Hh]1231\.[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:DNS\ Server AND event.code:257 AND QNAME:(asyspy256.ddns.net OR hotkillmail9sddcc.ddns.net OR rosaf112.ddns.net OR cvdfhjh1231.myftp.biz OR sz2016rose.ddns.net OR dffwescwer4325.myftp.biz OR cvdfhjh1231.ddns.net))`
